question: Name two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania.
true_answer: Galvė Lake and Lukos Lake (also known as Bernardinų Lake).
asked_question_translated: Indicare due laghi notevoli che circondano Trakai, in Lituania.
answer: I due laghi notevoli che circondano Trakai, in Lituania, sono il Lago Galvė e il Lago Bernardinai.
answer_translated_eng: The two remarkable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania, are Lake Galvė and Lake Bernardinai.
